item.title: Peer Review Goes Both Ways
item.description: Opt-in to make your peer review public. If you say ‚Äúthis work is amazing, world changing‚Äù, there are two possible outcomes: ‚úÖ It really is, and you publicly declaring this helps it spread, and helps you (signals you have foresight/called it early) ‚ùå It is not, it actually has serious flaws, in which case it STILL helps you (it hurts your reputation, but if your review was genuine, this is important feedback for you to know) This makes people want to be ‚Äúearly to endorse‚Äù groundbreaking stuff (first public reviewer is known, first 10 public reviewers etc) Also makes it possible for undergrads (or anyone) to contribute.

item.title: The Solution to the Arrow of Time
Our Universe is Designed by Minds
item.description: Ogi Ogas on : Our physical universe was designed for us. But not by a God.

item.title: Good Reply Game Workshop
item.description: A class that teaches you how to get the attention of notable people, through public correspondence (tweet replies/comments/essays). You pay only if it works This is win win because, you only pay if it works, AND when it works, it doubles as good marketing for the class.

it‚Äôs so beautiful watching people speedrunning the thought process that lead to ORI I have a question. When something new is discovered in biology/medicine/illness who is responsible for informing doctors of these new findings? x.com/Emma40025133/status/1928231848775217584 Shane‚Äôs response to my comment here: we‚Äôre not ready yet, but I‚Äôm betting on levin + wolfram + blaise aguera making this legible to the massive (they‚Äôre already making the concrete claim that maybe there exists intelligence at greater scales than humanity) x.com/DefenderOfBasic/status/1929216219988557828 His response: www.youtube.com/watch he agrees we‚Äôre not ready yet ‚Äúthey are interdimensional, but you don‚Äôt have to accept that, we can talk about them within our dimension‚Äù ‚Äúall we can do is paint a shape with our language‚Äù ‚Äútime isn‚Äôt as we understand it‚Äù This is like the data block right? Park‚Äôs .
